text: Chimonobambusa is a genus of East Asian bamboo in the grass family.Makino, Tomitarô. 1914. The botanical magazine, Shokubutsugaku zasshi, 28(329): 153–155 in English They are native to China, Japan, Vietnam, Myanmar, and the Himalayas.Flora of China, Vol. 22 Page 152, 方竹属 fang zhu shu Chimonobambusa Makino, Bot. Mag. (Tokyo). 28: 153. 1914. ;Species ;formerly included see Ampelocalamus Bambusa Chimonocalamus Drepanostachyum Himalayacalamus Vietnamosasa Yushania ==References== * Guadua Bamboo Category:Bambusoideae genera Category:Garden plants of Asia Category:Flora of Asia
title: Chimonobambusa
